description.value:
Frequency once per day

Effect You circulate magic through your wings, causing them to vibrate at high speeds such that their scraping produces disruptive sounds. You focus the sound at one creature within 30 feet who must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher) or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure, as the vibrations disrupt its inner equilibrium. You can Sustain the effect for up to 1 minute; the creature can't recover from the sickened condition as long as you continue your song and it can hear you.
